appsgate.lig.colorLight.actuator.spec
Interface CoreColorLightSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhilipsHUEImpl
public interface CoreColorLightSpec

This java interface is an ApAM specification shared by all ApAM AppsGate application to handle color light actuator

Since:
May 22, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

Method Detail

getLightStatus

org.json.JSONObject getLightStatus()
Get the current light status

Returns:
a JSON description of the light (JSON attribute depends on color light implementation)

getLightColor

long getLightColor()
Get the current light color

Returns:
the current color as a long integer

getLightBrightness

int getLightBrightness()
Get the current light brightness

Returns:
the current brightness as an integer

getLightColorSaturation

int getLightColorSaturation()
Get the current light color saturation

Returns:
the current light color saturation as an integer

getCurrentState

boolean getCurrentState()
Get the current light state (On/Off)

Returns:
true if the light is On and false otherwise

getManufacturerDetails

org.json.JSONObject getManufacturerDetails()
Get light manufacturer details

Returns:
a JSON object that contain details from manufacturer.

setStatus

boolean setStatus(org.json.JSONObject newStatus)
Set the complete status of the color light. This method allow to set several attribute at the same time.

Parameters:
newStatus - the new status as a JSON object
Returns:
true if the new status is set, false otherwise

On

boolean On()
Switch the light on

Returns:
true if the light turn on, false otherwise

Off

boolean Off()
Switch the light off

Returns:
true if the light turn off, false otherwise

setColor

boolean setColor(long color)
Put the light color

Parameters:
color - the new light color as a long integer
Returns:
true if the new color is set, false otherwise

setBrightness

boolean setBrightness(long brightness)
Put the color light brightness

Parameters:
brightness - as a long integer
Returns:
true if the new brightness is set, false otherwise

setSaturation

boolean setSaturation(int saturation)
Put the color saturation

Parameters:
saturation - as an integer
Returns:
true if the new saturation is set, false otherwise

increaseBrightness

boolean increaseBrightness(int step)
Increase the light brightness by step

Parameters:
step - the increase brightness step as an integer
Returns:
true if the light brightness has increased, false otherwise

decreaseBrightness

boolean decreaseBrightness(int step)
Decrease the light brightness by step

Parameters:
step - the decrease brightness step as an integer
Returns:
true if the light brightness has decreased, false otherwise

toggle

boolean toggle()
Invert the light mode

Returns:
true if the light state changed, false otherwise
